name: ElasticExportCriteo
description: This plugin adds the format Criteo to the Elastic Export.
author: plentysystems AG
license: GNU AFFERO GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 3, 19 November 2007

shortDescription.de: Die Integration des Datenformats Criteo-Plugin ermöglicht die Artikeldatenübertragung zum Affiliate-Dienstleister criteo über den elastischen Export.
shortDescription.en: The integration of the data format Criteo-Plugin enables the transfer of item data to the affiliate service provider criteo via the elastic export.
